1095.name: 309 LMo Tig
1095.Applications: A continuous, solid, corrosion-resistant wire of the ''309LMo'' type. 309MoL is used for the overlay welding of unalloyed and low-alloyed steels and for welding dissimilar steels, such as 316L, to unalloyed and low-alloyed steels when Mo is essential.
1095.Suitable_For: Buffer layers before hard facing, dissimilar joints between ferritic and austenitic steels and or other stainless steel types to standard carbon steel. Recommended for cladding on low alloyed steel in case AISI 316 is required as first layer.
